import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Carousel } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FaDumbbell, FaChartLine } from "react-icons/fa"; import hero1 from '../hero1.jpg' import hero2 from '../hero2.jpg' import hero3 from '../hero3.jpg' const FrontPage = () => ( <>

Own Your Workout.

Make Smart Decisions.

See Results.

Liftify is a smart workout partner that uses the principles of progressive overload to make sure you maximize your potential.

Starts where you do.

Liftify asks where you're currently at with your strength and builds your program accordingly.

Grows at your pace.

Liftify will adapt your next week's workout based on how you did this week.

); export default FrontPage;
